column2: UPDATE 1-Cigna rebuffs Anthem's "deeply disappointing" proposal June 21 Health insurer Cigna Corp  rebuffed Anthem Inc's $47 billion merger proposal on Sunday
column3: saying it was "deeply disappointed" with Anthem's recent actions and the offer was not in the best interest of shareholders. ~Cigna calls Anthem's offer "inadequate" June 21 Cigna Corp said on Sunday that Anthem Inc's "highly conditional
column4: non-binding proposal" is inadequate and that it is not in the best interest of Cigna shareholders. ~BRIEF-Cigna says Anthem proposal inadequate and not in best interests of Cigna shareholders * Says Anthem proposal inadequate and not in best interests of Cigna shareholders ~

column2: Williams Co exploring strategic options after unsolicited offer June 21 Energy company Williams Companies Inc  said on Sunday it is exploring strategic options after it received an unsolicited takeover proposal. ~Williams Co exploring strategic options after unsolicited offer   ~
